channel.title: Models on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Models on Automaly

item.title: Understand model store architectural in AX 2012
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn about AX 2012 model store architecture, layers, and models that replaced AOD files from previous versions. Understand how the model store manages application elements and customizations in the database.
